AutoVariable.label: F**k viewangles.
AutoVariable.tooltip: When it is time to look at the path, random viewangles are used. LOOK AT PATH CANNOT WORK WITH THIS, PERIOD.

AutoVariable.label: Look at path smoothness
AutoVariable.tooltip: Sets the smoothness of look at path.

AutoVariable.label: Runtime vischeck
AutoVariable.tooltip: Check visibility while pathing

AutoVariable.label: Vischeck delay
AutoVariable.tooltip: Delay between visibility checks in milliseconds

AutoVariable.label: Capture objectives
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically capture objectives (CTF, CP, and PL only).

AutoVariable.label: Defend while roaming
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to defend objectives while roaming around (RECOMMENDED)

AutoVariable.label: Safe capping
AutoVariable.tooltip: Make bots run pre-emptively from capture points in case of danger.

AutoVariable.label: Escape danger w. intel
AutoVariable.tooltip: Also try to escape from danger when carrying intel.

AutoVariable.label: Scout/Pyro sentry mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to target sentries as scout/pyro aswell. Usually not recommended.

AutoVariable.label: Prefer no-jump paths
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to find paths that don't require jumping when possible

AutoVariable.label: Safe pathing
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to path through safer areas away from edges

AutoVariable.label: Stalk enemies
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to outrange as sniper and close distance as scout/heavy

AutoVariable.label: YOLO mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't escape from danger at all

AutoVariable.label: YOLO mode for RAGE
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't escape from danger until RAGE player is dead

AutoVariable.label: Search spells
AutoVariable.tooltip: Became a witch! and automatically collect Halloween spells when you don't have one

AutoVariable.label: Search powerups
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically collect Mannpower powerups when you don't have one

AutoVariable.label: Search gargoyles
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically collect GARGOYLE during Halloween

AutoVariable.label: Avoid stickies
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to run away from sticky bombs

AutoVariable.label: Avoid projectiles
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to run away from rockets and pipes

AutoVariable.label: Sticky danger range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Distance to run from sticky bombs

AutoVariable.label: Projectile danger range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Distance to run from rockets and pipes

AutoVariable.label: Enabled
AutoVariable.tooltip: Makes your demoman charge automatically go towards the enemy. Only active when key is held, and does not trigger the charge itself.
